MIT Figure Skating Club
Paid Instructor Information Form 2002-2003
 
Your registration with the MIT Figure Skating Club permits you to teach Club
members during appropriate Club sessions. Please review our ice schedule and
usage rules, including program music privileges, on our web site. By the terms of
our agreement with MIT, you may not teach non-Club members at the MIT rink,
nor may you bring in guests to skate. Bring this form and attachments to the rink
for your first session. If you have any questions, contact the Club officers at
.
